keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only Labour will deliver the real change and stop Boris Johnson's disastrous Brexit.
Labour will rebuild our public services, including our NHS, our children’s futures, and the police force, to keep us safe, free for everyone.
Kickstart a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create 1 million new, high wage jobs.
Give people the final say on Brexit.
Build fairer society with lower rents, more council and social houses, ending the private profit in private and buy rent.
